attributes.action: Replace the "First Past The Post" electoral system in favour of a more equal Proportional Representation system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The First Past the Post electoral system, and does not reflect the views of the majority of the population.  Replace it with a fairer proportional representation system, which will affect how parties are represented, and will show a true representation for the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
